english.segment1: VERSE 1. Can you hear the sound, the sound of angels singing, the sound of angel's songs?. Let us join the sound, let us join the singing, let us join the song. CHORUS. Holy, holy is the Lord. Holy is the Lord. Holy is the Lord.
english.segment2: VERSE 2. Can you hear the sound, the sound of children singing, the sound of children's songs?. Let us join the sound, let us join the singing, let us join the song.
english.segment3: CHORUS. Holy, holy is the Lord. Holy is the Lord. Holy is the Lord. (repeat chorus twice)
english.segment4: BRIDGE. We join the angels' symphony, let it be heard over all the earth. We join the heavens as the sing.
english.segment5: CHORUS. Holy, holy is the Lord. Holy is the Lord. Holy is the Lord. (repeat chorus)Verse 1
